entities.description: Number of nights stayed in the hospital overnight or longer in the past 12 months.
Number of outpatient visits in the past 12 months.
Number of times visited a doctor, nurse, physician assistant, or nurse practitioner about one's own health in the past year.
Frequency of talking to a doctor, physician assistant, or nurse practitioner about health over the phone, by email, or through video calling in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of nights the respondent stayed in the hospital overnight or longer in the past 12 months.
Indicates the number of outpatient visits the respondent had in the past 12 months.
Indicates the number of times the respondent visited a doctor, nurse, physician assistant, or nurse practitioner about their own health in the past year.
Indicates the respondent talked to a doctor, physician assistant, or nurse practitioner about health via phone, email, or video calling instead of in-person appointments in the past 12 months.
